welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Egelsbach, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in all that our lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern and efficient terminal primarily used by Lufthansa and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Currently under construction and set to open in 2023, this new terminal will greatly increase the airport's capacity and offer state-of-the-art facilities.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport for up to 24 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reichelsheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
